item.title: A command that will
item.dc:creator: @Dizaster Dizaster
item.description:
@Dizaster wrote:

ok like yourfoldername[server]/cfg/autospawning.cfg
like that?
change this code :

					new FileWriter("config/autospawn.cfg", true));

To this one:

					new FileWriter("CFG/autospawn.cfg", true));

save compile now works enjoy

item.title: A command that will
item.dc:creator: @Dizaster Dizaster
item.description:
@Dizaster wrote:

if(command.startsWith("spawn") && playerRights > 2){ int npcid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6)); int absx = absX; int absy = absY; appendToAutoSpawn(npcid, absx, absy, absX + 2, absY + 2, absX -2, absY - 2); sendMessage("Npc added."); }
thats mine i did with walking 4x4

search for :appendToBanned
add above that void this code

[code]
public void appendToAutoSpawn(int npcid, int absx, int absy, int absx2, int absy2, int absx3, int absy3) {
BufferedWriter bw = null;

	try {
		bw = new BufferedWriter(
				new FileWriter("config/autospawn.cfg", true));
		bw.write("spawn = "+npcid+"	"+absx+"	"+absy+"	0	"+absx2+"	"+absy2+"	"+absx3+"	"+absy3+"	1");
		bw.newLine();
		bw.flush();
	} catch (IOException ioe) {
		ioe.printStackTrace();
	} finally {
		if (bw != null) {
			try {
				bw.close();
			} catch (IOException ioe2) {
				sendMessage("Error autospawning!");
			}
		}
	}

}[/code]

do That into you client.java lol

Read full topic
